name: 席然
awards: 2012年 第12届华语电影传媒大奖 最佳编剧 (提名) 到阜阳六百里
2011年 第48届台北金马影展 金马奖 最佳原著剧本 到阜阳六百里

last_movies.title: 一千零一夜 第一季

introduction: 年轻的影像创意工作者，创作媒介涵盖电影、MV、短片、商业广告。Young creative film maker whose reels include feature films、music videos、short films and commercials.广告科系及摄影师背景，深谙传播原理的同时兼具对影像语言的敏感，扎实的影像操作基础，配以灵活的发散思维。擅长对人物的细致捕捉，影片风格有趣而真实。A graduate in advertising, Xiran has a strong understanding of communication. As well as this, he is a photographer with a distinct yet sensitive feeling for framing images, creative ideas, and a skill for capturing the essence of his subject. Xiran’s films are humorous and realistic in tone thanks to a subtle observational eye.
